dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: Hello again. How are you finding Stellar Bay? Can I help you with anything?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Earlier, I overheard you say you were having money trouble.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Never mind.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: Not at all! Mr. Nandi treats us alright and pays us well. I just spent most of my paycheck on raptidon acid.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Do you normally blow your money on raptidon parts?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Well, that was stupid.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: Laws, no! Sometimes it's canid teeth. Or mantiswarm wings. Whatever Sebastian has in stock, really.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Why are you buying so much from Sebastian?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: If you've got that many bits to spend, then I've got some trash to sell you.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: So I can talk to him, of course! He doesn't get going about much else.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: Sort of the strong, silent type.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: Unfortunately, my apartment's kind of filling up with this stuff. And some of the neighbors are complaining about the smell.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Maybe I can talk to him for you.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Just ask him on a date.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: Would you? I'd appreciate that so much. Umm, maybe don't tell him I wanted you to ask. Just that you met this really nice lady named Celia, and she seemed-

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Wait. I'm curious - what do you see in Sebastian?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'll talk to you later.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: He doesn't talk much, but he's got this... quiet intensity, you know? Like there's stuff going on inside his head that you have no idea about.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: Plus, he's got great legs. It's hard to find a man who doesn't skimp on lower body exercises.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You really want to be with someone you can't talk to?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: There are other fish in the sea, Celia.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: That's... all I need to know.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: You think that's what I'm looking for? Aw, you're funny.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: Not in Stellar Bay! Everyone else who isn't taken either smells like saltuna or they're my boss.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: Besides, a man with a good smile and a proportionate upper-to-lower body ratio isn't something to pass up.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: Sorry, sometimes I get carried away.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: I couldn't! What if he says no?

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: Hey, maybe you could ask him for me. I mean, a "no" would still be bad, but it won't be quite as embarrassing if you ask.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: Oh, I don't need any of it! It's all so I can talk to Sebastian - he doesn't get going about much else.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: I didn't have any choice! That's all Sebastian had in stock the other day.
